column5: We are 6.8 miles from the airport and 14 miles from downtown San Antonio. We are close to loop , and loop 410. This is a private room with private bath at the end of the hall upstairs. The bed is a trundle bed. My 2 adult boys are in the rooms at the other end of the hall. We are a quiet family in a quiet and safe neighborhood. We also have 2 cats that are not allowed in the guest bedroom or outdoors. I enjoy meeting new people
column8: The White House, private room/private bath
